UAE, Jul 14, 2020 "The Chinese pharmaceutical group and the leading Abu Dhabi-based Group 42 delegation specialising in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and cloud computing, have signed an agreement for mutual cooperation which aims to advance the clinical operations of the vaccine in the UAE under DoH's supervision.
